website_summaries.verdict: The best drum set with the best package of musical benefits. Owners enjoy its electronic precision.
pros: Deluxe electronic machine with incredible quality and a huge library of pre-set sound choices
cons: The most expensive item on our shortlist, but it is well worth the price

website_summaries.verdict: A high-performance electronic drum set. Mesh drum heads give a natural feel and velocity when playing, with a massive sound library with easy customizable settings.
pros: The interface features a large LCD display, with simple controls to access the drum sample you need
Easily allocate different sounds to a drum head to build your own kit or use preset kits
Can connect to a digital audio workstation via USB
cons: Some users say the hi-hat pad isn't sensitive enough for their playing style

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: As an acoustic drummer, I was leary about going electronic, but apartment living required it if I was to play. I was pleasantly surprised with this kit. The heads feel like real drum heads, and the ability to tighten them to my liking only made them better. The bass drums is nice and responsive, as are the cymbals. My only gripe, and the reason for 4 instead of 5 stars, is the ha-ha pedal. It is not very responsive at all, making you lift your entire foot off of it most times to get the open sound. Overall, this is a great kit and I would certainly recommend it to anyone looking for an electronic set.
customer_reviews.author: Halo Aynie

customer_reviews.title: The real deal in e-drums
customer_reviews.text: I finally upgraded from an Alesis DM-6 with the "built in" talkback prevention feature (which amounted to the hi-hat not catching every hit if hitting the snare at the same time - really bad!) to this kit. Night and day difference, plus the mesh heads are just about as true a feel you could have to a regular drum set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the Roland V drums
customer_reviews.text: I like the Roland V drums. I have owned a TD 8 mesh head V drum kit for 12 years. Love it! I bought this TD11 kv kit expecting a newer version would offer more, but the TD 8 has it all over it. The TD11 is nice but it has less instraments and sounds to pick from. I also can't seem to get the bell on my dual trigger ride to ring. I can't find it in any of the menu's, even with talking with a Roland tech. Bottom line is, it is a nice kit but don't expect the world.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: The sound is deep and very much like a regular drum set
customer_reviews.text: After spending two years using another brand, this drum set really rocks!!!! The sound is deep and very much like a regular drum set. Tried it through a Peavy KB3.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis L.

customer_reviews.title: Wish I knew about the TD17
customer_reviews.text: Wish I knew Roland was coming out with a new kit before I ordered this one. This kit is a few years old and for the same price you can get a much, much better kit now. I ordered mine a few weeks before Roland announced the new TD17. Wish I waited a bit before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Humberto

customer_reviews.title: EXPENSIVE but you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny... from the moment you start unpacking the set to setting it up - it's total quality. Definitely recommend the investment over the less expensive options.
customer_reviews.author: Magnum

customer_reviews.title: This is a great kit. We use it for our churches youth ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kit. We use it for our churches youth group. It sounds really good with the presets, but we were also able to purchase and add some more that sound even better. It was more compact than I pictured, but after a week or two I became used to their size and that became a non-issue.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Pro level Edrums for smaller spaces
customer_reviews.text: Heads are a little small but you get used to them. Once you do they play great. Internal sounds are fine, but I use USB and generate sounds that through Superior Drummer on my computer. Sounds great and records to either SD or my DAW. Easy to set up and get going quickly. Due not lose drum key. Unique to VDrums and Roland does not sell replacements. There is one non Roland key that works.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Temple

customer_reviews.title: Hi Hat pedal failed
customer_reviews.text: Exactly 3 months of ownership and the HH foot pedal failed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I got this kit 4 months ago and love The way it feels to play
customer_reviews.text: I got this kit 4 months ago and love The way it feels to play. The mesh head are a lot better than the rubber pads. I still need to learn more about the controller, but over all I am very happy with the Drum kit.
customer_reviews.author: Street

customer_reviews.title: Kick pedal not included
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set but beware it does not come with the kick pedal (read the small print... :) )
customer_reviews.author: Bartman

customer_reviews.title: My son has been playing the kit everyday since the ...
customer_reviews.text: My son has been playing the kit everyday since the day we received it. He loves it, and the sound has not bothered us.
customer_reviews.author: chazb0

customer_reviews.title: Mesh pads at low price
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It's simple and the kits sound really nice
customer_reviews.author: Shoparuu

customer_reviews.title: Great drums!  Would recommend upgrading the hi-hat
customer_reviews.text: I bought these used and couldn't be happier with a first drum kit. Stick bounce off the mesh heads is quite good and the sounds you can get out of the kit are not bad. I like to plug the drums into my laptop and record them in Logic Pro X - very simple (once you know where to find the V-Drum mapping) and great for recording/editing. My only gripe is the hi-hat. I would suggest replacing it with the VH-11. Some other upgrade suggestions would be to get a PDX-100 snare and to use the aux input on the TD-11 module for another crash cymbal.
customer_reviews.author: Ballade No. 1 in G Minor

customer_reviews.title: Need electronic kit, this is great.
customer_reviews.text: We are on second gen as we started with TD4. We have acoustic kits but needed something for quiet practice and city apartment space. Mesh is the way to go. Rolands are very nice. Though it was daunting to take all the parts out of the boxes, they went together easily and intuitively. We thought the drum key and one single bolt we missing, but we found everything. Very pleased with this kit.
customer_reviews.author: DigitalSoul_1

customer_reviews.title: This kit is amazing! With so many options for sound
customer_reviews.text: This kit is amazing! With so many options for sound, I can play this thing for hours! I pounded on Kits at shops for a few years and this Roland is the best for the money by far! Be aware that it does not come with a base kick pedal, much less the double bass kick pictured! You can access a double base in the "Thrash Metal" setting, so no problem there. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: cliff

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought it from a local music shop, absolutely love it. Very responsive and durable, had it for a few months and still no sign of wear on the mesh heads, just some light cymbal marking and along the edge of the snare from doing rim shots
customer_reviews.author: Jorden F.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Roland product are the best, I love my drum set
customer_reviews.author: Joe X

product_meta.title: Roland Electronic Drum Set (TD-11KV)
feature_bullets: Supernatural-enhanced sound engine with Behavior Modeling provides an expressive and natural drumming experience
Diverse sound library covers a wide variety of musical genres for performance and practice
Professionally recorded backing songs onboard, ideal for play-along practice and performance
Practice features include Quick Record/Quick Play, plus a unique COACH function that helps players of all levels build drumming skills effectively
Large LCD and icon-driven user interface for easy operation

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars32 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
